caption.p:
Acute toxicity test of crude extract on the survival rate of adult Javanese medaka treated with different concentrations of the crude extract (62.5–1000 mg/L). The percentage of survival rate is shown versus concentration of crude extract.
∗
P < 0.01 represented significant different values of the control group and group exposed to crude extract. The values represent mean ± SD from three ( n = 3) independent experiments.
